entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 5:56 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: NE 39 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
